metadata.name: Ganga - Varanasi, India
metadata.description:
Ganga is one of the oldest rivers in the world, and people worship Ganga as their mother. People, mostly Hindus, come to perform many rituals, and the old proverb famous for the Ganga river is if a person takes a dip in the holy Ganga, they are free from their sins and the cycle of rebirth. The sightseeing around the river is mind-blowing. Ganga river is the source of many livelihoods.

Shot this beautiful moment during an early morning boat ride. 

Camera - Sony a7iii
Lens - 24mm - 70mm F/2.8
